  • Constructor Details

    • CarnivorousDinosaur

      public CarnivorousDinosaur​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, Sex sex, int startingHitPoints, int maxHitPoints, int maxUnconsciousRounds, int hungerAmount, int turnsToLayEgg, int mateAmount, AgeGroup ageGroup, int timeToGrow)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Dinosaur
      displayChar - Display char of the dinosaur
      sex - Sex of the dinosaur
      startingHitPoints - starting hitpoints for the dinosaur
      maxHitPoints - max hitpoints for the dinosaur
      maxUnconsciousRounds - number of rounds a dinosaur can stay unconscious without dying
      hungerAmount - Amount of health points below which a dinosaur feels hunger
      turnsToLayEgg - turns it takes to lay eggs
      mateAmount - food level above which mating is possible
      ageGroup - Age group of the dino (Baby or Adult)
      timeToGrow - turns needed to turn baby dinosaur to adult

  • Method Details

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor. Currently adds a feeding Action.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      A collection of Actions (For attacking and feeding)
